Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Should you choose to accept this proposal, you will not only be securing a valuable asset but also seizing a unique chance to benefit from our exceptional service and support. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
